languages.text: "Они внушают нам, что таков порядок! Просто потому, что родились на верхних палубах, а мы — во тьме нижних! Точно ли это воля Бога-Императора — позволять им жиреть за счет нас? Наслаждаться благами, пока мы умираем от недостачи воды и лекарств?" {n}Голос Молота гремит, и миряне внемлют. Их руки сжимаются в кулаки.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Они внушают нам, что таков порядок вещей! Просто потому, что родились на верхних палубах, а мы во тьме нижних! Точно ли это воля Бога-Императора — позволять им жиреть за счет нас? Наслаждаться благами, пока мы прозябаем, умираем от элементарной недостачи чистой воды и лекарств?"
{n}Голос Молота гремит над головами, и миряне внемлют и кивают. Их руки сжимаются в кулаки. В воздухе повисает злоба.{/n}

languages.text: "They tell us this is how it's meant to be! Just because they were born on the upper decks and we down below, in the darkness! Is it really the God-Emperor's will that they grow fat on the fruits of our labours? Revel in luxury while we die without water or medicine?" {n}Hammer's voice rumbles, and the laypeople listen. Their hands clench into fists.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Они внушают нам, что таков порядок! Просто потому, что родились на верхних палубах, а мы — во тьме нижних! Точно ли это воля Бога-Императора — позволять им жиреть за счет нас? Наслаждаться благами, пока мы умираем от недостачи воды и лекарств?" {n}Голос Молота гремит, и миряне внемлют. Их руки сжимаются в кулаки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "They tell us what the order should be! Simply because they were born on the upper decks and we were born in the darkness of the lower ones! Are you sure the God-Emperor wants them to grow fat with the fruit of our labours? Revel in luxury while we die from lack of water and medicine? " {n}The voice of Hammer rumbles, and the laypeople listen. Their hands clench into fists.{/n}

"They tell us what the order should be! Simply because they were born on the upper decks and we were born in the darkness of the lower ones! Are you sure the God-Emperor wants them to grow fat with the fruit of our labours? Revel in luxury while we die from lack of water and medicine? " {n}The voice of Hammer rumbles, and the laypeople listen. Their hands clench into fists.{/n}

"They tell us what the order should be! Simply because they were born on the upper decks and we were born in the darkness of the lower ones! Are you sure the God-Emperor wants them to grow fat with the fruit of our labours? Revel in luxury while we die from lack of water and medicine? " {n}The voice of Hammer rumbles, and the laypeople listen. Their hands clench into fists.{/n}

"They tell us what the order should be! Simply because they were born on the upper decks and we were born in the darkness of the lower ones! Are you sure the God-Emperor wants them to grow fat with the fruit of our labours? Revel in luxury while we die from lack of water and medicine? " {n}The voice of Hammer rumbles, and the laypeople listen. Their hands clench into fists.{/n}

"They tell us this is how it's meant to be! Just because they were born on the upper decks and we down below, in the darkness! Is it really the God-Emperor's will that they grow fat on the fruits of our labours? Revel in luxury while we die without water or medicine?" {n}Hammer's voice rumbles, and the laypeople listen. Their hands clench into fists.{/n}

"They tell us this is how it's meant to be! Just because they were born on the upper decks and we down below, in the darkness! Is it really the God-Emperor's will that they grow fat on the fruits of our labours? Revel in luxury while we die without water or medicine?" {n}Hammer's voice rumbles, and the laypeople listen. Their hands clench into fists.{/n}

languages.text: "So muss es sein, erzählen sie uns! Nur, weil sie auf den Oberdecks geboren wurden und wir unten, in der Dunkelheit! Ist es wirklich der Wille des Gottimperators, dass sie sich an den Früchten unserer Arbeit fettfressen? Sich im Luxus suhlen, während wir ohne Wasser oder Medikamente sterben?" {n}Hammers Stimme grollt, und die Laien lauschen ihm. Ihre Hände ballen sich zu Fäusten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They tell us this is how it's meant to be! Just because they were born on the upper decks and we down below, in the darkness! Is it really the God-Emperor's will that they grow fat on the fruits of our labours? Revel in luxury while we die without water or medicine?" {n}Hammer's voice rumbles, and the laypeople listen. Their hands clench into fists.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So muss es sein, erzählen sie uns! Nur, weil sie auf den Oberdecks geboren wurden und wir unten, in der Dunkelheit! Ist es wirklich der Wille des Gottimperators, dass sie sich an den Früchten unserer Arbeit fettfressen? Sich im Luxus suhlen, während wir ohne Wasser oder Medikamente sterben?" {n}Hammers Stimme grollt, und die Laien lauschen ihm. Ihre Hände ballen sich zu Fäusten.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Nos dicen que así es como deben ser las cosas! ¡Solo porque ellos nacieron en las cubiertas superiores y nosotros aquí abajo, en las sombras! ¿De verdad es la voluntad del Dios Emperador que engorden con los frutos de nuestros sacrificios? ¿Que disfruten del lujo mientras nosotros morimos sin agua ni medicina?». {n}La voz de Martillo retumba y los laicos escuchan. Aprietan los puños.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They tell us this is how it's meant to be! Just because they were born on the upper decks and we down below, in the darkness! Is it really the God-Emperor's will that they grow fat on the fruits of our labours? Revel in luxury while we die without water or medicine?" {n}Hammer's voice rumbles, and the laypeople listen. Their hands clench into fists.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Nos dicen que así es como deben ser las cosas! ¡Solo porque ellos nacieron en las cubiertas superiores y nosotros aquí abajo, en las sombras! ¿De verdad es la voluntad del Dios Emperador que engorden con los frutos de nuestros sacrificios? ¿Que disfruten del lujo mientras nosotros morimos sin agua ni medicina?». {n}La voz de Martillo retumba y los laicos escuchan. Aprietan los puños.{/n}

languages.text: 「こうあるべきだって連中は言う！連中は上層デッキで生まれて、俺らは下の暗闇の中で生まれたんだ！奴らが俺らの労働の成果で肥え太るのは、本当に神帝陛下のご意思なのか？俺らが水も薬もなくて死んでるってのに、贅沢を謳歌するのが？」{n}ハンマーの声が鳴り響き、平民たちが耳を傾ける。その手は拳の形で握りしめられている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They tell us this is how it's meant to be! Just because they were born on the upper decks and we down below, in the darkness! Is it really the God-Emperor's will that they grow fat on the fruits of our labours? Revel in luxury while we die without water or medicine?" {n}Hammer's voice rumbles, and the laypeople listen. Their hands clench into fists.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「こうあるべきだって連中は言う！連中は上層デッキで生まれて、俺らは下の暗闇の中で生まれたんだ！奴らが俺らの労働の成果で肥え太るのは、本当に神帝陛下のご意思なのか？俺らが水も薬もなくて死んでるってのに、贅沢を謳歌するのが？」{n}ハンマーの声が鳴り響き、平民たちが耳を傾ける。その手は拳の形で握りしめられている。{/n}

languages.text: “他们骗我们，说一切都是命运注定的！他们这么说，不过是因为他们出生在上层甲板，而我们出生在黑乎乎的底层！他们压榨我们的劳动成果，一个个脑满肠肥！他们过着奢靡的生活，可我们却因为缺水少药而死！这真的是神皇的旨意吗？”{n}“重锤”的声音轰鸣起来。底层船员认真地听着他的话，攥紧了拳头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They tell us this is how it's meant to be! Just because they were born on the upper decks and we down below, in the darkness! Is it really the God-Emperor's will that they grow fat on the fruits of our labours? Revel in luxury while we die without water or medicine?" {n}Hammer's voice rumbles, and the laypeople listen. Their hands clench into fists.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他们骗我们，说一切都是命运注定的！他们这么说，不过是因为他们出生在上层甲板，而我们出生在黑乎乎的底层！他们压榨我们的劳动成果，一个个脑满肠肥！他们过着奢靡的生活，可我们却因为缺水少药而死！这真的是神皇的旨意吗？”{n}“重锤”的声音轰鸣起来。底层船员认真地听着他的话，攥紧了拳头。{/n}

languages.text: « Ils arrêtent pas de nous dire que c'est comme ça et pas autrement ! Tout ça parce qu'ils sont nés sur les ponts supérieurs, alors que nous, on a vu le jour dans la crasse et les ténèbres des ponts inférieurs ! Ils s'engraissent avec le fruit de notre labeur ! Est-ce là vraiment ce que veut l'Empereur-Dieu ? Qu'ils se vautrent dans le luxe pendant que nous, on crève à petit feu à force d'être privés d'eau et de médicaments ? » {n}La voix de Marteau gronde, et les profanes écoutent, les poings serrés.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They tell us this is how it's meant to be! Just because they were born on the upper decks and we down below, in the darkness! Is it really the God-Emperor's will that they grow fat on the fruits of our labours? Revel in luxury while we die without water or medicine?" {n}Hammer's voice rumbles, and the laypeople listen. Their hands clench into fists.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ils arrêtent pas de nous dire que c'est comme ça et pas autrement ! Tout ça parce qu'ils sont nés sur les ponts supérieurs, alors que nous, on a vu le jour dans la crasse et les ténèbres des ponts inférieurs ! Ils s'engraissent avec le fruit de notre labeur ! Est-ce là vraiment ce que veut l'Empereur-Dieu ? Qu'ils se vautrent dans le luxe pendant que nous, on crève à petit feu à force d'être privés d'eau et de médicaments ? » {n}La voix de Marteau gronde, et les profanes écoutent, les poings serrés.{/n}

languages.text: "Bize bunun böyle olması gerektiğini söylüyorlar. Hem de sırf onlar üst güvertelerde, biz de alt güvertelerin karanlığında doğduk diye! Tanrı İmparator'un hakiki arzusu, bizim emeklerimizin getirisiyle göbeklerini büyütmeleri, biz susuz ve ilaçsız kalıp ölürken onların lüks içinde yaşamaları mı?" {n}Çekiç'in sesi gümbürdüyor, avam takımı dinliyor. Sıktıkları elleri, yumruk hâlini alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They tell us this is how it's meant to be! Just because they were born on the upper decks and we down below, in the darkness! Is it really the God-Emperor's will that they grow fat on the fruits of our labours? Revel in luxury while we die without water or medicine?" {n}Hammer's voice rumbles, and the laypeople listen. Their hands clench into fists.{/n}
